metadata.name: Renamed Vmnat.exe Execution
metadata.comment: Detects renamed vmnat.exe or portable version that can be used for DLL side-loading

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('vmnat.exe') AND NOT endswith(lower(process.name), lower('vmnat.exe')))

output.summary: Detects renamed vmnat.exe or portable version that can be used for DLL side-loading
